name: Multiple boundary cases in one test
fullName: features/tv_intervals.feature:Multiple boundary cases in one test
description:
As a TV scheduling system
I want to automatically calculate 15-minute intervals for programs
So that I can track program duration in standardized time blocks
descriptionHtml:
As a TV scheduling system
I want to automatically calculate 15-minute intervals for programs

statusMessage:

assert 1 == 0

E   AssertionError: Expected 0 intervals for 'Edge Case 1', got 1
